definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Ps 90:17 delightfulness, pleasantness (Ecclus [[נועם תירוש]] Sir 32:6);—´[[נ]] abs. Zec 11:7 + 4 t.; cstr. Ps 27:4, Ps 90:17; —
delightfulness of ´[[י]]: contemplated in temple Ps 27:4, shewn in his favour, [[עָלֵינוּ]]…[[אדני]] ´[[וִיהִי נ]] Ps 90:17.
name of one of two symbol. staves Zec 11:7, Zec 11:10.
pleasantness, as defining genit.: ´[[דַּרְכֵי־נ]] Pr 3:17; ´[[אִמְרֵי־נ]] Pr 15:26, Pr 16:24.
